messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] That was funny.
messages.msgSnippet: That is really funny you should say that, cause I have never heard of anyone chopping people up in Austrailia... Then again I don t read the newspaper that
messages.messageBody:
That is really funny you should say that, cause I have never heard of anyone chopping people up in Austrailia... Then again I don't read the newspaper that often, but I do love talking about japanese ANYTHING. So if you have ANYTHING japanese to talk about just give me a holler.

James Eckman <FUGU@...> wrote:>
>
>Subject: R: URGENT NOTICE TO AUSTRALIAN COLLECTORS - ALL SWORDS TO BE BANNED
>
>The Victorian Government has given notice that it intends to declare ALL
>SWORDS
>to be prohibited weapons.
>
Is there any reason why? You don't have a bunch of Mad Max wannabes
hacking of limbs do you?

Jim
